name: firekingdom
0:
”Alexa, open fire kingdom”
”Alexa, ask fire kingdom to find my orders”
”Alexa, ask fire kingdom for my order status”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fire kingdom
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is used to track order status for your fire kingdom Orders on an Alexa Device.
To use this skill you can say
Alexa, open fire kingdom followed by
 - Where's my stuff or What's my order status
